channel.title: Jail command

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:10, topic:262793”]HmMmM

could someone please help me what codes i need to add to make it work??

here is my code so far:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441

} String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3228; , 2312; c.teleportToY = 3407; , 2212; c.teleblock = true; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("You be released soon!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

huh?[/quote]

what?

Read full topic

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:4, topic:262793”]You should know this. It’s too easy.

You can’t have

c.teleportToX = 3228; , 2312;

It would have to be

c.teleportToX = 3228; [/quote]

someone had a code like that so i tryed it but had errors still. not not changed since.

do you know how i can do it and what codes i need to add?

ok, forget that code, lets go back to the one that works.
so how would i make it so it teles to one of the places but random?

item.title: Jail command
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

could someone please help me what codes i need to add to make it work??

here is my code so far:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3228; , 2312; c.teleportToY = 3407; , 2212; c.teleblock = true; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("You be released soon!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

error:

client.java:10828: illegal start of expression c.teleportToX = 3228; , 2312; ^ client.java:10829: illegal start of expression c.teleportToY = 3407; , 2212; ^ 2 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

for people who dont know what im trying to do and need help on:

i am trying to make it so when i do ::jail it either teles them to jail or another place.

help will be appriecated.

thanks,

I AM NOT USING DELTA!

Read full topic
